channel.title: Can Location Services write to a draft note?
channel.description:
Drafts asks for location data, which I’m assuming it stores in it’s own metadata for a note. Is it possible to insert this data into a note?
It would be nice to insert the geolocation data into notes I capture when I’m out an about.

item.title: Can Location Services write to a draft note?
item.dc:creator: roguefury
item.description:
Cool, I’ll have to try that out

Read full topic
item.source: Can Location Services write to a draft note?
